solution_line_template: Michael held {michael_multiplier} times Haley's, so he held {haley_marshmallows} x {michael_multiplier} = <<{michael_multiplier}*{haley_marshmallows}={michael_marshmallows}>>{michael_marshmallows} marshmallows

Brandon held half as many marshmallows as Michael, so he held {michael_marshmallows} / {brandon_divisor} = <<{michael_marshmallows}/{brandon_divisor}={brandon_marshmallows}>>{brandon_marshmallows} marshmallows
